channel.title: Me vs The Robots
channel.description: Recent content on Me vs The Robots

item.title: Me vs The Robots
item.description:
This is the first post of an idea throwing blog.

I decided to start this blog as a way to document small findings on my journey understanding how to work with A.I and trying to keep up to date.

At the same time I hope this helps to anyone trying to get the hang of vibe coding and surviving the tech industry in trying times.

To whomever reads this.. Feel free to have questions and challenge anything I write here i’m learning.
